fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Give a random Insurgent a bomb during the day.
- Give a bomb to a specific player during the day instead.
- Learn the name of another Insurgent player during the night. 1 Use
- Attack a target during the night IF there are no other Insurgents. You will be informed when this is the case.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When given a bomb, the player may, instead of their normal night action, perform a basic attack to a chosen player. However, if this chosen player is also an Insurgent, they will instead hand the bomb to them for use the next night.
- If you die, a random Insurgent will be promoted to the Despot. Insurgent (Informant)s are prioritized last.
- Detection immunity to the Sheriff.
